DOC.brief_summary: This proof of principle PK study will allow GSKCH to select the most favorable sustained release formulation among 3 prototypes to move to the next stage of drug development.
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Investigating the Rate and Extent of Paracetamol Absorption of Three Experimental Sustained Release Pediatric Suspensions
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Body Mass Index between 19.0 28.0 (kg/m2) inclusive
